mapper.select: select DISTINCT res.* from mubs_resource res left outer join mubs_role_resource rres on res.id = rres.resourceId left outer join mubs_role_user ru on rres.roleId = ru.roleId where ru.userId = #{userId} order by res.longNumber

select ra.* from mubs_resource res left outer join mubs_role_resource rres on res.id = rres.resourceId left outer join mubs_role_user ru on rres.roleId = ru.roleId left outer join mubs_resource_action ra on rres.resourceActionId = ra.id
and ru.userId in (#{condition.userId})
and ra.resourceId in (#{condition.resourceId})

select mdgd.* from mubs_datagroup_data mdgd inner join mubs_user_datagroup mudg on mudg.datagroupId = mdgd.datagroupId
and mudg.userId in (#{condition.userId})
and mdgd.dataModelId in (#{condition.dataModelId})
